attributes.action: exert all reasonable pressure on Transport For London and the Association of London Government to ensure 24-hour Red Route and Bus Lane access for London licensed Private Hire vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Even though all Private Hire ('minicab') vehicles and drivers are now licensed just as Hackney Cabs, they are still denied access (UNLIKE Hackney Cabs)to Red Routes and Bus Lanes, mitigating against a true 'door-to-door' service (especially for older and/or disabled passengers) as well as being unable to provide a faster   alternative to private vehicles through the use of a designated road space.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
